SELECT id, title, summary, content, cover_image AS coverImage, status, CASE status WHEN 0 THEN '草稿' WHEN 1 THEN '已发布' WHEN 2 THEN '已下线' ELSE '未知状态' END AS statusText, publish_time AS publishTime, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_news WHERE is_deleted = 0
